about_the_game:
Gameplay Features

The Art of the Bite

Not all blood is equal, and not all moments are ripe for a bite!

  • Choose your moment carefully: Humans are unpredictable, and you’ll need to observe their habits to find the perfect window to strike.

  • Master the bite: Timing is everything—pierce human skin for that precious meal, but don’t get greedy! Overstay your welcome and you’ll be swatted away in a flash.

Legacy of the Swarm

To ensure your species continues, you must raise the next generation.

  • Lay eggs strategically: Safe, hidden spots are crucial to avoid detection. You’re not just surviving for today; you’re securing the future of your swarm.

  • Nurture your offspring: The young ones are depending on you to teach them the ways of the night. Protect them, and they’ll carry on your legacy.

Avoid the Deadly Traps

Humans have designed a world full of hazards that can squash your existence in seconds.

  • Fly swatters, traps, sprays, and more! The humans have set up deadly contraptions to keep you at bay. Quick reflexes and sharp instincts are a must to stay one step ahead.

  • Stay in the shadows: Use your surroundings to your advantage—find cover, dodge, and weave through the environment to avoid capture.

Survival of the Quickest and Smartest

In this world, it’s not just about being fast—it’s about being clever.

  • Study human behavior: Observe their routines, anticipate their movements, and time your actions with surgical precision.

  • Use your speed to escape: Outrun those swats, outsmart those traps, and slip into the night when you’ve had your fill.

  • Mission: Your survival depends on your ability to outwit the humans around you, avoid deadly traps, and ensure your offspring continue your legacy. But be careful—every decision could mean the difference between life and death.

A Blend of Humor, Strategy, and Adrenaline

Predator of the Night is a unique mashup of strategic thinking, pure survival instinct, and a dash of humor. Each moment will have you laughing as you outwit your human enemies and cheering as you grow your mosquito dynasty.

Do you have what it takes to be the master of the bite? Can you avoid the endless dangers lurking in the human world and ensure your swarm’s survival? Dive into the Predator of the Night and test your skills in this thrilling, unpredictable, and sometimes hilarious adventure!

Will you thrive... or become just another victim of humanity’s relentless pursuit? The night is yours to conquer—if you can survive it.

name: Predator of the Night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 or AMD equivalent 4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 or AMD equivalent 4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Predator of the Night: Survive in the Human World! Step into the tiny shoes (or wings!) of a mosquito and experience the world from a new, buzzing perspective. Predator of the Night challenges you to survive, feed, and thrive in a human-dominated environment where danger lurks at every corner.
